name: SYMINITY
description:
After many months in the making...
Salmon Studios presents... SYMINITY


Embark on an epic adventure like no other in this unique ideal idle clicker game. Combining elements of role-playing games with the addictive gameplay of idle clickers, this game will keep you engaged for hours on end.

In this game, you play as a brave adventurer, traveling across a vast and magical world filled with danger and mystery. With each click, you gather resources and power-ups that will help you on your quest to defeat the ultimate enemy, Commander X.

But this game is more than just a simple idle clicker. As you progress through the game, you'll unlock new abilities, items, and companions that will aid you in battle. Choose wisely how you spend your resources, and develop a strategy that will lead you to victory.

Experience the thrill of battle in this unique and engaging idle clicker game. With stunning graphics and addictive gameplay, you won't be able to put it down. Download now and start your journey to become the greatest adventurer of all time!

Discord: https://discord.gg/PsNNdzYsBD
